wikipedia_page.main: Oris Erhuero (Born 23 September 1968) is a British actor, producer, writer, and fashion model.  After modelling for several years, he transitioned into television and film, with roles in The Adventures of Sinbad, The Bill, Highlander: Endgame, Sometimes in April. and the latest Award winning film Redcon-1, where Oris was awarded as Best Actor  Oris Erhuero own his film production company and is the head designer of bespoke jewellery.

response: | Highlander: Endgame || Miramax Films || Douglas Aarniokoski (director); Joel Soisson (screenplay); Adrian Paul, Christopher Lambert, Bruce Payne, Lisa Barbuscia, Donnie Yen, Peter Wingfield, Jim Byrnes, Damon Dash, Beatie Edney, Sheila Gish, Oris Erhuero, Ian Paul Cassidy, Adam Copeland, June Watson, Donald Douglas, Doug Aarniokoski || Fantasy || Live action

Sometimes in April is a 2005 American made-for-television historical drama film about the Rwandan genocide, written and directed by the Haitian filmmaker Raoul Peck. The ensemble cast includes Idris Elba, Oris Erhuero, Carole Karemera, and Debra Winger.
Oris Erhuero, Traci Lords, and Jon Polito have all been involved in the Highlander Franchise.

* Adventures of Sinbad actor, Oris Erhuero talks about shooting The Cursed Ones

Road To Yesterday is a 2015 Nigerian road romantic drama film directed by Ishaya Bako. It stars Genevieve Nnaji and Oris Erhuero in lead roles, with Majid Michel and Chioma 'Chigul' Omeruah in supporting roles. The film, which is co-produced by Genevieve Nnaji, is the actress' first effort as a producer.
